content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #145

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Add the traditional table describing the message fields for Event Notification Errors.

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira
Chapter/section: Event Notification Errors
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: NEG :exclamation: Clarification

Summary: Add the traditional table describing the message fields for Event Notification Errors.

Comment: I suggest adding the the traditional table describing the message fields for Event Notification Errors.

See table example in Event Notification Request Details section.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

NiklasSvenzen commented on Issue #145

Agreed, propose adding table as suggested

isaacvetter edited a comment on Issue #145

This section: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html#event-notification-errors

Note that three sections need this table:
1) https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html#event-notification-errors
2) https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html#request-context-change
3) https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html#query-for-current-context

wmaethner commented on Issue #145:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

isaacvetter commented on Issue #145:

Of these three tableless sections:

1) https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html#request-context-change
This is done: http://fhircast.org/specification/STU1/#request-context-change

1) https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html#query-for-current-context
We removed this section from the spec during ballot.

1) https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html#event-notification-errors
This is fixed in PR #282.
